com.percussion.tools
Interface IPSLogger

public interface IPSLogger

This interface defines a few methods to log the messages so that any plugin can use.

Method Summary
 String getLoggerError()
          Deprecated. use log4j methods.
 void logDebugMessage(String msg)
          Deprecated. use log4j methods.
 void logMessage(String msg)

Method Detail

logMessage

void logMessage(String msg)
Deprecated. use log4j methods.

Logs the message to whatever output the Logger object was initialized with no matter whether the Logger is in debug mode or not. This method is normally used to log a mandatory message.

Parameters:
msg - - the message to be logged, must not be null.
Throws:
IllegalArgumentException - if the msg is null or empty.

logDebugMessage

void logDebugMessage(String msg)
Deprecated. use log4j methods.

Logs the message to whatever output the Logger object was initialized with only if Logger is in debug mode. This method is normally used to log a extra information for debug purpose.

Parameters:
msg - - the message to be logged, must not be null.
Throws:
IllegalArgumentException - if the msg is null or empty.

getLoggerError

String getLoggerError()
Deprecated. use log4j methods.

If an IOException occurs while logging, the exception will be available through this method.

Returns:
the exception message or null if no exception occurred.

resetLoggerError

void resetLoggerError()
Deprecated. use log4j methods.

Resets the logger exception string to null.
